name: Death's Hold
effect_desc1: Increases Penetration by 1% when hit (max 10 stacks)
effect_desc1_jp: ダメージを受けた場合、貫通力が1%ずつUPする。(最大10回まで累積)
effect_desc1_kr: 피격 시 관통력 1%씩 증가 (최대 10회 누적)
effect_desc4: Increases Penetration by 2% when hit (max 10 stacks)
effect_desc4_jp: ダメージを受けた場合、貫通力が2%ずつUPする。(最大10回まで累積)
effect_desc4_kr: 피격 시 관통력 2%씩 증가 (최대 10회 누적)

name: Coward's Treasure
effect_desc1: Has a 15% chance to Counterattack when an ally is hit
effect_desc1_jp: 味方がダメージを受けた場合、15%の確率で代わりに反撃する。
effect_desc1_kr: 아군 피격 시 15% 확률로 대신 반격 시전
effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to Counterattack when an ally is hit
effect_desc4_jp: 味方がダメージを受けた場合、30%の確率で代わりに反撃する。
effect_desc4_kr: 아군 피격 시 30% 확률로 대신 반격 시전

name: Burning Soul
effect_desc1: +10% Priority to the caster when killing an enemy
effect_desc1_jp: 敵を倒した時、自分の行動ゲージが+10%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 적 처치 시 자신의 행동 게이지 +10%
effect_desc4: +20% Priority to the caster when killing an enemy
effect_desc4_jp: 敵を倒した時、自分の行動ゲージが+20%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 적 처치 시 자신의 행동 게이지 +20%

name: Spirit of Unification
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase Attack by 30% for 1 turn(s) at the start of battle
effect_desc1_jp: 戦闘開始時、50%の確率で攻撃力が1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 전투 입장 시 50% 확률로 1턴 동안 공격력 증가
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase Attack by 30% for 1 turn(s) at the start of battle
effect_desc4_jp: 戦闘開始時、100%の確率で攻撃力が1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 전투 입장 시 100% 확률로 1턴 동안 공격력 증가

name: Overdrive
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to heal the wearer by 20% when an enemy Counterattacks
effect_desc1_jp: 敵が反撃関連のスキルを使用時、50%の確率で自分のHPを20%回復する。
effect_desc1_kr: 적이 반격 형태의 스킬 사용 시 50% 확률로 자신의 체력 20% 회복
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to heal the wearer by 20% when an enemy Counterattacks
effect_desc4_jp: 敵が反撃関連のスキルを使用時、100%の確率で自分のHPを20%回復する。
effect_desc4_kr: 적이 반격 형태의 스킬 사용 시 100% 확률로 자신의 체력 20% 회복

name: Clock Up
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase Critical Damage by 50% for 1 turn(s) when inflicted with a debuff at the start of the turn
effect_desc1_jp: ターン開始時、自分に弱体効果がある場合、50%の確率で会心ダメージが1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 턴 시작 시 약화 효과가 적용된 상태라면 50% 확률로 1턴 동안 치명 피해 증가
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase Critical Damage by 50% for 1 turn(s) when inflicted with a debuff at the start of the turn
effect_desc4_jp: ターン開始時、自分に弱体効果がある場合、100%の確率で会心ダメージが1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 턴 시작 시 약화 효과가 적용된 상태라면 100% 확률로 1턴 동안 치명 피해 증가

name: Blue-Gems White Ring
name_jp: ブルーアイズ・ホワイトリング
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to increase the Priority of the wearer by 10% when hit (Only once per turn)
effect_desc1_jp: 敵からダメージを受けた場合、50%の確率で自分の行動ゲージが10%UPする。(この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない)
effect_desc1_kr: 피격 시 50% 확률로 자신의 행동 게이지 10% (1턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase the Priority of the wearer by 10% when hit (Only once per turn)
effect_desc4_jp: 敵からダメージを受けた場合、100%の確率で自分の行動ゲージが10%UPする。(この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない)
effect_desc4_kr: 피격 시 100% 확률로 자신의 행동 게이지 10% (1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Combination Simulator
name_jp: コンビネーションシミュレーター
effect_desc1: At the start of battle, has a 37.5% chance each to increase Accuracy and Effectiveness for 1 turn(s)
effect_desc1_jp: 戦闘開始時、37.5%の確率で命中・効果命中を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc1_kr: 전투 입장 시 각각 37.5% 확률로 명중,효과 적중 1턴
effect_desc4: At the start of battle, has a 75% chance each to increase Accuracy and Effectiveness for 1 turn(s)
effect_desc4_jp: 戦闘開始時、75%の確率で命中・効果命中を1ターンの間付与する。
effect_desc4_kr: 전투 입장 시 각각 75% 확률로 명중,효과 적중 1턴

name: Search and Destroy
effect_desc1: Has a 80% chance to increase Critical Hit Chance by 2.5% at the start of a turn (max 6 stacks)
effect_desc1_jp: ターン開始時、80%の確率で会心率が2.5%ずつUPする。(最大6回まで累積)
effect_desc1_kr: 턴 시작 시 80% 확률로 치명 확률 2.5%씩 증가 (최대 6회 누적)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to increase Critical Hit Chance by 6% at the start of a turn (max 6 stacks)
effect_desc4_jp: ターン開始時、100%の確率で会心率が6%ずつUPする。(最大6回まで累積)
effect_desc4_kr: 턴 시작 시 100% 확률로 치명 확률 6%씩 증가 (최대 6회 누적)

name: Resurrection Token
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to resurrect and heal for 15% of Max Health when killed (activated once per battle)
effect_desc1_jp: 倒れた時、50%の確率で最大HPの15%を回復して復活する。(戦闘につき1回のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 사망 시 50% 확률로 최대 체력의 15%를 회복하며 부활 (전투당 1회 발동)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to resurrect and heal for 30% of Max Health when killed (activated once per battle)
effect_desc4_jp: 倒れた時、100%の確率で最大HPの30%を回復して復活する。(戦闘につき1回のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 사망 시 100% 확률로 최대 체력의 30%를 회복하며 부활 (전투당 1회 발동)

name: Dancer's Bracelet
effect_desc1: Increases Effectiveness proportional to missing Health (max 25%)
effect_desc1_jp: 残りHPが低いほど、効果命中がUPする。(最大25%)
effect_desc1_kr: 체력이 감소할수록 효과 적중 증가 (최대 25%)
effect_desc4: Increases Effectiveness proportional to missing Health (max 50%)
effect_desc4_jp: 残りHPが低いほど、効果命中がUPする。(最大50%)
effect_desc4_kr: 체력이 감소할수록 효과 적중 증가 (최대 50%)

name: Charmer's Necklace
effect_desc1: The wearer takes 15% of the damage all allies take (only the ally with the highest Max Health can activate this effect)
effect_desc1_jp: 味方全体が攻撃を受けた場合、ダメージの15%を代わりに受ける。(最大HPが最も高い味方1体のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 모든 아군이 받는 피해의 15%를 착용자가 대신 입음 (최대 체력이 높은 아군 1명만 발동)
effect_desc4: The wearer takes 30% of the damage all allies take (only the ally with the highest Max Health can activate this effect)
effect_desc4_jp: 味方全体が攻撃を受けた場合、ダメージの30%を代わりに受ける。(最大HPが最も高い味方1体のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 모든 아군이 받는 피해의 30%를 착용자가 대신 입음 (최대 체력이 높은 아군 1명만 발동)

name: Clear Mind
effect_desc1: Heals for 15% of Max Health when dodging an enemy attack
effect_desc1_jp: 敵の攻撃を回避した場合、最大HPの15%回復する。
effect_desc1_kr: 적의 공격을 회피한 경우, 최대 체력의 15% 회복
effect_desc4: Heals for 30% of Max Health when dodging an enemy attack
effect_desc4_jp: 敵の攻撃を回避した場合、最大HPの30%回復する。
effect_desc4_kr: 적의 공격을 회피한 경우, 최대 체력의 30% 회복

name: Memento Mori
effect_desc1: Increases Attack by 4% at the start of a turn (max 5 stacks)
effect_desc1_jp: ターン開始時、攻撃力が4%ずつUPする。(最大5回までUP)
effect_desc1_kr: 턴 시작 시 공격력 4%씩 증가 (최대 5회)
effect_desc4: Increases Attack by 8% at the start of a turn (max 5 stacks)
effect_desc4_jp: ターン開始時、攻撃力が8%ずつUPする。(最大5回までUP)
effect_desc4_kr: 턴 시작 시 공격력 8%씩 증가 (최대 5회)

name: Saint's Ring
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster at the start of a turn
effect_desc1_jp: ターン開始時、50%の確率で自分の弱体効果を1個解除する。
effect_desc1_kr: 턴 시작 시 50% 확률로 자신이 보유한 약화 효과 1개 해제
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to remove 1 debuff from the caster at the start of a turn
effect_desc4_jp: ターン開始時、100%の確率で自分の弱体効果を1個解除する。
effect_desc4_kr: 턴 시작 시 100% 확률로 자신이 보유한 약화 효과 1개 해제

name: Glorious Radiance Orb
effect_desc1: Damage dealt increases by 15% (Excluding critical hits)
effect_desc1_jp: ダメージが15%UPする。(会心ダメージは除く)
effect_desc1_kr: 피해량 15%(치명 공격 제외)
effect_desc4: Damage dealt increases by 30% (Excluding critical hits)
effect_desc4_jp: ダメージが30%UPする。(会心ダメージは除く)
effect_desc4_kr: 피해량 30%(치명 공격 제외)

name: Fool's Dawn
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant a Barrier for 1 turn at the start of battle (proportional to Max Health)
effect_desc1_jp: 戦闘開始時、50%の確率で1ターンの間シールドが付与される。(最大HPが高いほどシールド量UP)
effect_desc1_kr: 전투 시작 시 50% 확률로 1턴간 실드 생성 (최대 체력 비례)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant a Barrier for 1 turn at the start of battle (proportional to Max Health)
effect_desc4_jp: 戦闘開始時、100%の確率で1ターンの間シールドが付与される。(最大HPが高いほどシールド量UP)
effect_desc4_kr: 전투 시작 시 100% 확률로 1턴간 실드 생성 (최대 체력 비례)

name: Starlight Road
name_jp: スターライト・ロード
effect_desc1: Inflicts reduced Critical Damage on the enemy team for 1 turn at the start of battle (37.5% chance each)
effect_desc1_jp: 戦闘開始時、敵全体の会心ダメージを1ターンの間DOWNさせる。(効果はそれぞれ37.5%の確率で適用)
effect_desc1_kr: 전투 시작 시 적 팀의 치명 피해 감소 1턴 (각각 37.5% 확률)
effect_desc4: Inflicts reduced Critical Damage on the enemy team for 1 turn at the start of battle (75% chance each)
effect_desc4_jp: 戦闘開始時、敵全体の会心ダメージを1ターンの間DOWNさせる。(効果はそれぞれ75%の確率で適用)
effect_desc4_kr: 전투 시작 시 적 팀의 치명 피해 감소 1턴 (각각 75% 확률)

name: Queen of Prism
name_jp: クイーン・オブ・プリズム
effect_desc1: Grants a Barrier to the caster when hit (40% of Attack / only once per turn)
effect_desc1_jp: ダメージを受けた場合、自分にシールドを付与する。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。(シールド量は攻撃力の40%)
effect_desc1_kr: 피격 시 자신에게 실드 생성 (공격력의 40% / 1턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Grants a Barrier to the caster when hit (80% of Attack / only once per turn)
effect_desc4_jp: ダメージを受けた場合、自分にシールドを付与する。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。(シールド量は攻撃力の80%)
effect_desc4_kr: 피격 시 자신에게 실드 생성 (공격력의 80% / 1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Physical Exorcism
name_jp: フィジカルエクソシズム
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt in PvP content by 20%
effect_desc1_jp: 敵に与えるダメージが20%UPする。この効果はPVPコンテンツのみ発動される。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신이 PVP에서 입히는 피해 20%
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt in PvP content by 40%
effect_desc4_jp: 敵に与えるダメージが40%UPする。この効果はPVPコンテンツのみ発動される。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신이 PVP에서 입히는 피해 40%

name: A Prima Vista
effect_desc1: Grants a Barrier to the caster when counterattacking (50% of the wielder's Attack / only once per turn)
effect_desc1_jp: 反撃時、シールドを付与する。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。(シールド量は攻撃力の50%)
effect_desc1_kr: 반격 시 실드 생성 (자신 공격력의 50%, 1턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Grants a Barrier to the caster when counterattacking (100% of the wielder's Attack / only once per turn)
effect_desc4_jp: 反撃時、シールドを付与する。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。(シールド量は攻撃力の100%)
effect_desc4_kr: 반격 시 실드 생성 (자신 공격력의 100%, 1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Unholy Exsultet
effect_desc1: Reduces enemy team Attack by 5%
effect_desc1_jp: 敵全体の攻撃力を5%DOWNさせる。
effect_desc1_kr: 적 팀 공격력 5%
effect_desc4: Reduces enemy team Attack by 10%
effect_desc4_jp: 敵全体の攻撃力を10%DOWNさせる。
effect_desc4_kr: 적 팀 공격력 10%

name: Obsidian Oath
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to decrease the wielder's debuff durations when an enemy takes an action (Only once per turn)
effect_desc1_jp: 敵が行動時、50%の確率で自分の弱体効果のターンを減少させる。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。
effect_desc1_kr: 적 행동 시 50% 확률로 자신의 모든 약화 효과 지속 시간 감소 (1턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to decrease the wielder's debuff durations when an enemy takes an action (Only once per turn)
effect_desc4_jp: 敵が行動時、100%の確率で自分の弱体効果のターンを減少させる。この効果は1ターンに一度しか発動しない。
effect_desc4_kr: 적 행동 시 100% 확률로 자신의 모든 약화 효과 지속 시간 감소 (1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Dies Irae
effect_desc1: If the wielder inflicts a debuff on their turn , increases Priority by 20% (Once every 2 turns)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分のターンに、敵に弱体効果を付与した場合、自分の行動ゲージが20%UPする。この効果は2ターンに一度しか発動しない。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신의 턴에 약화 효과 부여 시, 자신의 행동 게이지 20% 증가(2턴에 1회)
effect_desc4: If the wielder inflicts a debuff on their turn , increases Priority by 40% (Once every 2 turns)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分のターンに、敵に弱体効果を付与した場合、自分の行動ゲージが40%UPする。この効果は2ターンに一度しか発動しない。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신의 턴에 약화 효과 부여 시, 자신의 행동 게이지 40% 증가(2턴에 1회)

name: Absolute Music
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt by allies to boss enemies by 5% (Excluding the wearer)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分以外の味方全体が、ボスに与えるダメージが5%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 모든 아군이 보스에게 입히는 피해 5% (자신 제외)
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt by allies to boss enemies by 10% (Excluding the wearer)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分以外の味方全体が、ボスに与えるダメージが10%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 모든 아군이 보스에게 입히는 피해 10% (자신 제외)

name: Adventurer's Necklace
effect_desc1: Has a 15% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after being hit
effect_desc1_jp: ダメージを受けた後、15%の確率で貫通力が+1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 피격 후 15% 확률로 관통력 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 30% chance to increase Penetration for 1 turn after being hit
effect_desc4_jp: ダメージを受けた後、30%の確率で貫通力が+1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 피격 후 30% 확률로 관통력 +1턴

name: Briareos's Ambition [Striker]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの野望【攻撃型】
effect_desc1: Increases damage dealt to enemies with lower Accuracy than the wearer by 25%
effect_desc1_jp: 自分より命中の低い敵に与えるダメージが25%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신보다 명중이 낮은 적에게 주는 피해 25%
effect_desc4: Increases damage dealt to enemies with lower Accuracy than the wearer by 50%
effect_desc4_jp: 自分より命中の低い敵に与えるダメージが50%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신보다 명중이 낮은 적에게 주는 피해 50%

name: Briareos's Ambition [Defender]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの野望【防御型】
effect_desc1: Increases Priority of the wearer by 5% after an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies (Activated only once every 2 turns)
effect_desc1_jp: 味方が全体攻撃後、自分の行動ゲージが5%UPする。(2ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 아군이 전체 공격 후 자신의 행동 게이지 5% (2턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Increases Priority of the wearer by 10% after an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies (Activated only once every 2 turns)
effect_desc4_jp: 味方が全体攻撃後、自分の行動ゲージが10%UPする。(2ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 아군이 전체 공격 후 자신의 행동 게이지 10% (2턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Briareos's Ambition [Ranger]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの野望【スピード型】
effect_desc1: Increases damage by 1% for every 7 Effectiveness (Max 100%)
effect_desc1_jp: 効果命中が7ごとに与えるダメージが1%UPする。(最大100%までUP)
effect_desc1_kr: 효과 적중 7마다 피해 +1% (최대 100%)
effect_desc4: Increases damage by 1% for every 3 Effectiveness (Max 100%)
effect_desc4_jp: 効果命中が3ごとに与えるダメージが1%UPする。(最大100%までUP)
effect_desc4_kr: 효과 적중 3마다 피해 +1% (최대 100%)

name: Briareos's Ambition [Mage]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの野望【魔法型】
effect_desc1: Increases Priority of the wearer by 7.5% when scoring a critical hit (Activated only once per turn)
effect_desc1_jp: 会心発生時、自分の行動ゲージが7.5%UPする。(1ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 치명 공격 시 자신의 행동 게이지 7.5% (1턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: Increases Priority of the wearer by 15% when scoring a critical hit (Activated only once per turn)
effect_desc4_jp: 会心発生時、自分の行動ゲージが15%UPする。(1ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 치명 공격 시 자신의 행동 게이지 15% (1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Briareos's Ambition [Healer]
name_jp: ブリアレオスの野望【回復型】
effect_desc1: Increases Resilience of the wearer by 15%
effect_desc1_jp: 自分の効果抵抗が15%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 자신 효과 저항 15%
effect_desc4: Increases Resilience of the wearer by 30%
effect_desc4_jp: 自分の効果抵抗が30%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 자신 효과 저항 30%

name: Gorgon's Vanity [Striker]
name_jp: ゴルゴンの虚夢【攻撃型】
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant increased Accuracy for 1 turn when inflicted with a debuff at the start of the turn
effect_desc1_jp: ターン開始時、自分に弱体効果がある場合、50%の確率で命中が1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 턴 시작 시 약화 효과가 적용된 상태라면 50% 확률로 명중 +1턴
effect_desc4: Has a 100% chance to grant increased Accuracy for 1 turn when inflicted with a debuff at the start of the turn
effect_desc4_jp: ターン開始時、自分に弱体効果がある場合、100%の確率で命中が1ターンの間UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 턴 시작 시 약화 효과가 적용된 상태라면 100% 확률로 명중 +1턴

name: Gorgon's Vanity [Defender]
name_jp: ゴルゴンの虚夢【防御型】
effect_desc1: When hit by an attack that targets all enemies, grants increased Effectiveness for 1 turn (Activated only once every 5 turn(s))
effect_desc1_jp: 敵から全体攻撃を受けた場合、効果命中が1ターンの間UPする。(5ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc1_kr: 전체 공격 피격 시 효과 적중 +1턴 (5턴에 1회만 발동)
effect_desc4: When hit by an attack that targets all enemies, grants increased Effectiveness for 1 turn (Activated only once every 1 turn(s))
effect_desc4_jp: 敵から全体攻撃を受けた場合、効果命中が1ターンの間UPする。(1ターンに1回のみ発動)
effect_desc4_kr: 전체 공격 피격 시 효과 적중 +1턴 (1턴에 1회만 발동)

name: Gorgon's Vanity [Ranger]
name_jp: ゴルゴンの虚夢【スピード型】
effect_desc1: Increases damage by 10% proportional to the number of buffs granted
effect_desc1_jp: 付与されている強化効果の数に応じてダメージが10%UPする。
effect_desc1_kr: 보유한 강화 효과마다 피해 10%
effect_desc4: Increases damage by 20% proportional to the number of buffs granted
effect_desc4_jp: 付与されている強化効果の数に応じてダメージが20%UPする。
effect_desc4_kr: 보유한 강화 효과마다 피해 20%

name: Gorgon's Vanity [Mage]
name_jp: ゴルゴンの虚夢【魔法型】
effect_desc1: Increases Speed proportional to missing Health (Max 25%)
effect_desc1_jp: 自分の残りHPが低いほど、スピードがUPする。(最大25%までUP)
effect_desc1_kr: 잃은 체력 비례 속도 증가 (최대 25%)
effect_desc4: Increases Speed proportional to missing Health (Max 50%)
effect_desc4_jp: 自分の残りHPが低いほど、スピードがUPする。(最大50%までUP)
effect_desc4_kr: 잃은 체력 비례 속도 증가 (최대 50%)

name: Gorgon's Vanity [Healer]
name_jp: ゴルゴンの虚夢【回復型】
effect_desc1: Has a 50% chance to grant increased Effectiveness to all allies for 1 turn after using a Burst Skill
effect_desc1_jp: バーストスキル使用後、 50%の確率で味方全体の効果命中が1ターンの間UPする。

effect_desc1: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 2% every turn (Max 5 stacks)
